Articles.Content: Hey everyone, I'm sorry if this has been asked before but is there a way to view your altitude info (showing ap/peri, actual altitude, etc etc) while playing? Kind of how kerbal engineer works? I thought I saw somewhere that 1.2 would have that and that it would be enabled in the debut menu. Not sure if that's true but its one of those "stock" things that really should be implemented into the game without mods.
No, not really. The only new thing there is that you can get the "altitude"  of the ground at a specific point, using KerbNet.
